name: When Will It Be Time?
description:
This is a short essay-like object about bodily autonomy when you're trans and a certain type of disabled and both of those things are perceived as "crazy."

It was made for the trans fucking rage jam.

Minimum price $1 in accordance with jam guidelines; feel free to pay as much or as little as you like. All proceeds go towards this disabled trans artist making future cool shit.

content notes: abuse, ableism, transphobia, misogyny, misgendering, J.K. Rowling, medical bigotry including ABA/conversion therapy

EDIT: Itch ate the file lmao; here it is actually possible to purchase! If you clicked away before bc of that it should be fixed now lol
